p: Ribavirin ( Figure 11) is a nucleoside analog antiviral agent. Structurally, ribavirin was modified so that the nucleobase part was replaced by a 1,2,4-triazole ring with a carboxamide group in the third position. ADME profile wise, ribavirin is a highly soluble, highly polar rigid molecule, suited both for oral and iv administration. Thanks to its high hydrosolubility, its oral bioavailability reaches 50%, but can be increased when co administrated with a fatty meal [ 123].
